text.text: "NEVER microwave your water!  Only use an electric kettles for heating and boiling; otherwise the texture will get unbearable!"
"Who needs ten wives when you can bang your sister?"
"We've killed a lot of people so I guess that's good… it warms the heart!"
"They are going to have to instate polygamy after this shit!"
"If I'm using a heavy weppy… eh?  Heavy weppy?  Heavy weppy?  What is wrong with me?"
"Bezos personally comes to my house and hands me six-figure checks now.  That's my life now."
"Thought I could fist my way through that problem, but turns out you can't fist your way through everything."
"I kinda wish I could put out like a, uh, like some sort of 'fuck off' buoy!"
"I'm not going to murder you…  I'm just gonna take you home, throw you in a bed, and fist you.  Nothing weird."
"I love how the second there's a zombie everyone's like:  'Can you fuck it!?'"
"Bashing that kid with an axe was more work than I thought it would be."
"The drildo was too good.  Like it wasn't, uh, like obscenely…  I mean, it was kinda busted."
